sense.name: protect by insurance
sense.examples: Our company insures homeowners and businesses. She insured herself against losses. Your father insured you to drive his car. She insured her ring for $5,000. They refused to insure us because they said we're too old. Many companies won't insure new or young drivers.

sense.name: ensure, assure or guarantee
sense.examples: This insures that persons with disabilities have an equal access to parking. I insure that final test is fair, but also challenging. Check to insure that you have allowed enough room for mistakes.
